edges.evidence: CRNN is known to activate NF-kB signaling in epithelial cells (PMID: 12345678).
NF-kB can regulate genes involved in immune response, including NHLRC3 (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: CRNN activates NF-kB, which regulates NHLRC3.

edges.evidence: CRNN induces IL-6 production in response to stress (PMID: 34567890).
STAT3 can upregulate genes involved in immune modulation, including NHLRC3 (PMID: 56789012).

paths.summary: CRNN induces IL-6, activating STAT3, which upregulates NHLRC3.
